name: telegram-bot
description: TON Circle Telegram Bot - Group expense manager on TON Blockchain

scripts.db:setup: psql -U postgres -c 'CREATE DATABASE toncircle;' && psql -U postgres -d toncircle -f src/database/schema.sql
scripts.db:reset: psql -U postgres -c 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS toncircle;' && npm run db:setup
